title: Identify the input values
text: When considering y as a function of x, the input variable is x.

title: Identify the output values
text: When considering y as a function of x, the output variable is y.

title: Classify the relation
text: $$x=\pm \sqrt{1-y}$$ means $$y=1-x^2$$, so each x can only lead to one particular y. Therefore, y is a function of x.
